channel.title: Something is not working: how to debug it on
channel.description: Recent content in Something is not working: how to debug it on

item.title: Quick debug
item.description: Check the service status If you are using one of the system.d service only: Open a terminal on the computer, and enter: sudo systemctl status <name_of_the_service>.service Note: Default running service is reachy_sdk_server.service. An error may be indicated in the terminal. Check ROS topics Open a terminal on the computer, and enter: ros2 topic list If all services are launched, you should see the following list: Full/Starter kit topic list:

item.title: Support
item.description: FAQ Check if your question is part of our FAQ. Forum Visit our forum if you have any questions, maybe someone has already asked the same question or other people could benefit from the answer! ðŸ‘‰ Any questions relative to your development with Reachy?Go to forum.pollen-robotics.com Pollen Robotics support For any specific questions concerning your robot or if you meet problems with the product, please contact us at support@pollen-robotics.com.
